dmca.title: Official Notice of Tesnet Suspention
dmca.body:
******************
We are forwarding a notification we received under the Digital 
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) that the IP address registered to you 
contains material which infringes one or more copyrights.  Under Federal 
law, the University is required to immediately suspend Resnet service 
when it receives a DMCA notice.  There is a $100 administrative fee 
associated with this suspension.

You must schedule a time to meet with Margaret Landsparger in the 
Information Technology office, B8 EERC, between 1:00 and 3:00 to (1) 
Discuss Copyright Policy at MTU (2) confirm that the infringing material 
has been removed from your computer, and (3) that you have read and 
understand the Michigan Tech Computer Use Policy, located at: 
http://www.cec.mtu.edu/cacsec/info/cup_approved.html. This meeting is 
mandatory and must be attended whether you remain on resnet or not, 
along with a Ethical Decision making writing assignment conducted by the 
Office of Student affairs.

Reply to this E-mail to schedule your appointment

If there is a second violation, there will be much more serious 
consequences from Michigan Tech.  At a minimum, a student will be 
charged with violation of the computer use policy, theft of intellectual 
property and failure to comply with an official request, AND may have 
their Resnet service suspended for an indefinite period of time. 

It is important to respect the intellectual property of others as a 
matter of personal ethics.   Moreover, there are serious consequences to 
copyright violations, including substantial civil penalties, and the 
possibility of criminal prosecution.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         Notice ID: 182-2457566 ESA Foreign Notice
Date:         Mon, 22 Jan 2007 10:52:50 -0800
From:         esa-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
Reply-To:         esa-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
To:         abuse@mtu.edu



-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Entertainment Software Association
575 7th Street, NW, Suite 300
Washington, DC 20004 USA

Attention:  Intellectual Property Enforcement
Telephone:  202-223-2400
E-mail:  esa@copyright-compliance.com

14 Jan 2007 19:43:48 GMT


ISP: Michigan Technological University
ESA Reference Number: 182-2457566

Dear Michigan Technological University:

The Entertainment Software Association (ESA) is a U.S. trade association that
represents the intellectual property interests of numerous companies that publish
interactive games for video game consoles, personal computers, handheld devices and
the Internet  in the United States and in other countries (collectively referred to
as ESA members).  ESA is authorized to act on behalf of ESA members whose copyright
and other intellectual property rights it believes to be infringed as described
herein. 

ESA is providing this letter of notification to make Michigan Technological
University aware of material on its network or system that infringes the exclusive
copyright rights of and is unlawful towards one or more ESA members.

Through the Berne Convention and other international treaties covering intellectual
property rights, ESA believes that its members' rights in such entertainment
software products are entitled to the full protection of the intellectual property
law as well as other relevant laws of your country.

Based on the information at its disposal, ESA has a good faith belief that the IP
address below infringes the rights of one or more ESA members by offering for sale
or download unauthorized copies of game products protected by copyright, or offering
for sale or download material that is the subject of infringing activities.  The
copyrighted works that have been infringed include but are not limited to:

Title: Sims
Infringement Source: BitTorrent
Infringement Timestamp: 11 Jan 2007 10:04:13 GMT
Infringement Last Documented: 11 Jan 2007 10:04:13 GMT
Infringer Username: 
Infringing Filename: Sims 2 downloads/Downloads.rar
Infringing Filesize: 560546819
Infringer IP Address: 141.219.80.228
Infringer DNS Name: logik.resnet.mtu.edu
Infringing URL: http://www.fulldls.com/get_others_15452



The unauthorized copies of such game product(s) or the material that is the subject
of infringing activities appears on or is made available through the above-listed IP
address.  Those items are listed and/or identified thereon by their titles or
variations thereof, game-related listings/references/descriptions, or depictions of
game-related artwork.  Such copies, titles, game-related
listings/references/descriptions, depictions, and material that is the subject of
infringing activities, are hereinafter referred to as "Infringing Material."   

Accordingly, ESA hereby requests Michigan Technological University to immediately do
the following:

1.        Notify the account holder of the Infringing Material.
2.         Remove, or disable access to, the Infringing Material detailed above.
3.         Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms 
        of Service Agreement, including termination of a repeat offender.

Please inform us whether you will remove or disable access to the Infringing
Material as requested.  Michigan Technological University or the account holder may
contact ESA at the above-listed contact details, with email preferred.  Please
include the above-noted Reference Number in the subject line of all email
correspondence.

Thank you for your cooperation and prompt response in this matter. 

Sincerely,

Intellectual Property Enforcement
Entertainment Software Association


- ---Start ACNS XML
